description.value:
Rather than controlling the elements or transforming the environment, mages of the veil focus on much more subtle magicâ€”blending into their surroundings to watch, observe, and gather secrets, or fading from view completely for the sake of solitude. Most graduates of this college become spies, scouts, or infiltrators.

Associated School: Illusion.

Requirements: A mage of the veil must select disguise self as one of his spells known at 1st level.

Class Skills: A mage of the veil gains Bluff, Disguise, and Stealth as class skills.

Replacement Powers: This subschool replaces the blinding ray and invisibility field powers of the illusion school.
